mapper.select: select child.* from resource child,resource parent where child.parent_resource_id = parent.resource_id and child.parent_resource_id=#{resource_id} and child.enabled=1 and child.is_deleted=0 and parent.enabled=1 and parent.is_deleted=0 order by child.priority asc
select res.* from role r,resource res, resource_role rr where r.role_id = rr.role_id and rr.resource_id = res.resource_id and r.id=#{id} and res.enabled=1 order by res.priority asc
mapper.sql: id, gmt_created, gmt_modified, created_by, modified_by, is_deleted, resource_id, parent_resource_id, is_parent, name, url, type, description, priority, enabled, style
mapper.insert: insert into resource (id, gmt_created, gmt_modified, created_by, modified_by, is_deleted, resource_id, parent_resource_id, is_parent, name, url, type, description, priority, enabled, style ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentResourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
